description: Vice President Harris is trying to shore up one of her biggest political liabilities while hammering her opponent for his role in inflaming tensions over immigration and border security.
title: Harris visits the border in Arizona and says she will toughen up asylum rules

description: The Hackney area of East London is burgeoning with art galleries and cafes. But the neighborhood, like many places that are appealing to young professionals, is rapidly losing families with children. And some experts say it's a bad sign for the future. We go to Hackney to understand the problem.
title: Something is Missing from London: Children

description: In the 12th lawsuit filed against the hip-hop mogul since last November, an unnamed victim alleges that Sean Combs coerced her into sex, impregnated her, then threatened her into silence.
title: Sean Combs accused of impregnating, threatening woman in new assault lawsuit

description: A medicine that sidesteps the brain's dopamine receptors to reach different targets represents a new approach to schizophrenia treatment. The Food and Drug Administration approved it Thursday.
title: A new kind of drug for schizophrenia promises fewer side effects

description: In a fiery speech at the United Nations General Assembly, the Israeli prime minister said his country would is "winning" and would attack Iran and its proxies anywhere in the Middle East.
title: Netanyahu defies calls for a cease-fire at the U.N., as Israel strikes Lebanon

description: In New York major party candidates automatically appear on the ballot, but minor party candidates must collect 45,000 voter signatures by petition in order to qualify. Kennedy, who has withdrawn from the race and backed Donald Trump, gathered more than 100,000 valid signatures.
title: Supreme Court rejects RFK Jr's appeal to be put on the New York ballot

description: An 18-year-old filed a lawsuit against another baseball fan after the two tussled over Ohtani's historic 50th homerun ball. Now, an online auction for the ball may add another fan into the mix.
title: Auction for Shohei Ohtani's 50/50 ball goes live as fans fight over who owns it

description: Bangladesh was born in poverty but has risen up the income ladder. Today it's a model of health progress. Here's how to preserve and improve its record of achievement.
title: Bangladesh defies stereotypes when it comes to health care. Let's keep it that way

description: The Justice Department unveiled criminal charges against three Iranian hackers who allegedly compromised Trump campaign accounts and sought to erode confidence in the U.S. election.
title: Trump campaign hack traced to three Iranians seeking to disrupt election, DOJ says

description: FOX Weather meteorologist Bob Van Dillen was broadcasting from Atlanta early this morning when he heard a woman crying for help in the dark.
title: A meteorologist in Atlanta rescued a woman from Helene floodwaters on camera

description: Helene is dumping rain across the Southeast, after coming ashore as a powerful Category 4 storm. Abnormally warm water in the Gulf of Mexico helped it rapidly intensify and suck up moisture.
title: Abnormally warm water helped Helene rapidly intensify and suck up moisture

description: Before Helene even made landfall in Florida, authorities conducted a dramatic rescue operation: The U.S. Coast Guard saved a man whose sailboat started taking on water off the coast of Sanibel Island.
title: The Coast Guard save a man and his dog from a sinking boat off the coast of Florida

description: Some 25,000 dockworkers at East and Gulf Coast ports may strike as early as October 1 if their union doesn't reach a contract deal with shipping companies and port operators.
title: Dockworkers are on the verge of a strike. Here's what you need to know

description: Oscar, Emmy, and Tony-winning actress Maggie Smith played everything from wistful ingenues in Shakespeare to Harry Potter's Prof. McGonagall and the Dowager Countess in Downton Abbey.
title: Sharp tongued, indomitable, and beloved actress Dame Maggie Smith, dies at 89

description: An estimated 110,000 trans teenagers live in states that ban gender-affirming care for minors. Some travel huge distances every few months to keep getting their treatment out-of-state.
title: Her state bans gender-affirming care for teenagers. So she travels 450 miles for it

description: Hurricane Helene raked the coast of the Carolinas on September 27, 1958, but did not actually make landfall, according to the National Hurricane Center.
title: Exactly 66 years ago, another Hurricane Helene rocked the Carolinas

description: Hurricane Helene made landfall late last night as a Category 4 storm. It has since weakened but continues to batter the South, causing damage and power outages. And, takeaways from voters in Nevada.
title: Hurricane Helene batters the South. And, takeaways from voters in swing state Nevada

description:
Among the 33,000 sound effects, free for anyone to use, are reindeer grunts, frog croaks and crowds at the 1989 FA Cup Final.
(Story aired on All Things Considered on Sept. 26, 2024.)
title: The BBC’s vast library of sound effects — 33,000 of them — is open to the public

description: The attorney general pledged to restore the Justice Department to normal order. It hasn't been easy, and may not last.
title: Biden's attorney general wanted to return to normal order; it hasn't been easy

description: Morning Edition spoke to Nevada Sen. Catherine Cortez Masto, who worked with VP Harris when the two were state attorneys general, on why that experience is relevant to being Commander in Chief.
title: Q&A: Nevada Sen. Cortez Masto on teaming up with VP Harris as attorney generals

description: Historical markers were once just for American history. But many now claim aliens have visited earth from outer space — and they aren't hedging.
title: Are UFO's real? Historical markers say yes

description: The Chicago White Sox have 120 losses, tied for the most in a season — one more L, and the record would be theirs. Fans at the final home game said they wouldn't mind seeing history made.
title: As the White Sox narrowly avoid loss #121, fans bid farewell to a season to forget

description: An NPR listener says they are ready to adopt a child and move on from in vitro fertilization. But their wife is focused on having a baby.
title: Dear Life Kit: My wife wants to use the last of our savings for a 4th round of IVF

description: This week, a zoo said it would send its pandas packing, a fabled game character finally got her chance to shine, and a mayor was indicted. Were you paying attention?
title: Do you know your indicted mayors from your deported pandas? Take our news quiz

description: As voters in the key swing state of Pennsylvania start receiving mail ballots, multiple legal fights over how the ballots of mail-in voters should be counted are still playing out in the courts.
title: Legal questions about Pennsylvania mail-in ballots loom as voting starts

description: The Biden administration accuses charter companies of collaborating with global smuggling networks.
title: Migrants from around the world are trying to reach the U.S. via charter planes
